events.message: I received my order last week but it was not what I expected. I want to request a refund because the product is completely different from the description.
The system has classified this case under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your order was not as expected. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and explain what was wrong with the product so I can assist you further?
My order number is 12345678. The item was supposed to be a wireless keyboard but I received a wired one instead.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a full refund for you as soon as you return the wrong item. I will send you the return instructions shortly.
That sounds good. Please send me the return shipping label and instructions so I can send it back quickly.
I have emailed you the return label and instructions. Once we receive the returned product, the refund will be processed immediately.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund after returning the item. Please let us know if you need any further help.
The refund has been confirmed and the case is now closed. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
